description: Explore the decentralization of Arbitrum, a promising Ethereum Layer 2 solution. This article delves into its architecture, governance, and community engagement to assess its decentralized nature.
keywords: Arbitrum, decentralization, Ethereum, Layer 2 solution, governance, architecture, community engagement, scalability, Optimistic Rollup, validators
title: Is Arbitrum Decentralized? A Closer Look at Its Landscape
